translations: 不受妨碍的，不受阻碍的

sentences.sentence: She had unhindered access to the files.
He was able to pass unhindered through several military checkpoints.
sentences.translation: 他畅行无阻地通过了好几处军事检查站。

sentences.sentence: His wish was fulfilled--the body rested, while the spirit went unhindered on its pilgrimage.
sentences.translation: 他的愿望实现了——他的身体得到了休息，而他的灵魂则在遨游。
